posts.post_title: 1880's H804-& Merchant's Gargling Oil Full Color Struck Out
posts.post_content:
1880's H804-7 Merchant's Gargling Oil "Struck Out" Full Color Variation. The full color version rarer.  Asking $45 for this trade card.  The one you see more often does not have the color background. 

Thanks, 
Chris 
[url]ckb333@gmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/cbcbcb_photos/MerchantOilBack.jpg[/IMG]
Bumped for price reduction.  Great price on this full color version.
